article.title: Magically turn your phone into a tablet with adb for testing tablet views!
article.author: Matt McKenna
article.excerpt: Learn how to use adb to change a phone's screen size and density to render tablet views.

authors.bio:
Hi I'm Matt! I spend my days typing on a keyboard creating things for our favorite 
green robot and battling build time boredom.
authors.name: Matt McKenna
